<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;PreviousRange&quot; tracks the lowest unioned range that is being processed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Its lower is fixed and the upper may be updated over iterations.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to union &quot;PreviousRange&quot; and &quot;CR&quot;. If they are disjoint, push</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;PreviousRange&quot; to the result and assign it to &quot;CR&quot;, a new union range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, update the upper of &quot;PreviousRange&quot; to cover &quot;CR&quot;. Note that,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the lower of &quot;PreviousRange&quot; is always less or equal the lower of &quot;CR&quot;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UnionAndUpdateRange = &#91;&amp;PreviousRange,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0, j = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (i &lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrangelist/#ab7bb6ba03311ea7bb96234d8e366c385">size</a>() &amp;&amp; j &lt; CRL.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrangelist/#ab7bb6ba03311ea7bb96234d8e366c385">size</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a34bd74317e3f04bfc4318c2d1a470877">Range</a> = this-&gt;Ranges&#91;i&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;OtherRange = CRL.Ranges&#91;j&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The intersection of two Ranges is (max(lowers), min(uppers)), and it&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// possible that max(lowers) &gt; min(uppers) if they don&#39;t have intersection.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add the intersection to result only if it&#39;s non-empty.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To keep simple, we don&#39;t call ConstantRange::intersectWith() as it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// considers the complex upper wrapped case and may result two ranges,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// like (2, 8) &amp;&amp; (6, 4) = &#123;(2, 4), (6, 8)&#125;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> Start = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/apintops/#a6d2ea807ef8eb6d40335d6f11edf942c">APIntOps::smax</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a34bd74317e3f04bfc4318c2d1a470877">Range</a>.getLower(), OtherRange.getLower());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> End = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/apintops/#a688eca8fbe6295f4b002f1e705d3e916">APIntOps::smin</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a34bd74317e3f04bfc4318c2d1a470877">Range</a>.getUpper(), OtherRange.getUpper());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Start.slt(End))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Result.Ranges.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrange">ConstantRange</a>(Start, End));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Move to the next Range in one list determined by the uppers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example: A = &#123;(0, 2), (4, 8)&#125;; B = &#123;(-2, 5), (6, 10)&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need to intersect three pairs: A0 &amp;&amp; B0; A1 &amp;&amp; B0; A1 &amp;&amp; B1.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a34bd74317e3f04bfc4318c2d1a470877">Range</a>.getUpper().slt(OtherRange.getUpper()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">      i++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">      j++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
